table.name: vtiger_vreport
table.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `vtiger_vreport` ( `reportid` int(19) NOT NULL, `folderid` int(19) NOT NULL, `reportname` text DEFAULT '', `description` text DEFAULT '', `reporttype` varchar(50) DEFAULT '', `queryid` int(19) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `state` varchar(50) DEFAULT 'SAVED', `customizable` int(1) DEFAULT '1', `category` int(11) DEFAULT '1', `owner` int(11) DEFAULT '1', `sharingtype` varchar(200) DEFAULT 'Private', PRIMARY KEY (`reportid`), KEY `report_queryid_idx` (`queryid`), KEY `report_folderid_idx` (`folderid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

table.name: vtiger_vreport
table.sql: ALTER TABLE vtiger_vreport ADD CONSTRAINT `fk_2_vtiger_vreport` FOREIGN KEY (`queryid`) REFERENCES `vtiger_selectquery` (`queryid`) ON DELETE CASCADE;

table.name: vtiger_vreport
table.sql: ALTER TABLE `vtiger_vreport` ADD COLUMN `position` TEXT DEFAULT NULL ;

table.name: vtiger_vreport
table.sql: ALTER TABLE `vtiger_vreport` ADD COLUMN `modifiedtime` datetime DEFAULT NULL ;

vtiger_vreport_sharers
table.sql: ALTER TABLE vtiger_vreport_sharers ADD CONSTRAINT `vtiger_vreport_reportid_ibfk_4` FOREIGN KEY (`reportid`) REFERENCES `vtiger_vreport` (`reportid`) ON DELETE CASCADE;

table.sql: ALTER TABLE vtiger_vreport_sharers ADD CONSTRAINT `vtiger_rolesd_rsid_ibfk_2` FOREIGN KEY (`rsid`) REFERENCES `vtiger_role` (`roleid`) ON DELETE CASCADE;

table.sql: ALTER TABLE vtiger_vreport_shareusers ADD CONSTRAINT `vtiger_users_userid_ibfk_2` FOREIGN KEY (`userid`) REFERENCES `vtiger_users` (`id`) ON DELETE CASCADE;

table.name: vtiger_vreportdatefilter
table.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `vtiger_vreportdatefilter` ( `datefilterid` int(19) NOT NULL, `datecolumnname` varchar(250) DEFAULT '', `datefilter` varchar(250) DEFAULT '', `startdate` date DEFAULT NULL, `enddate` date DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`datefilterid`), KEY `reportdatefilter_datefilterid_idx` (`datefilterid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

table.name: vtiger_vreportgroupbycolumn
table.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `vtiger_vreportgroupbycolumn` ( `reportid` int(19) DEFAULT NULL, `sortid` int(19) DEFAULT NULL, `sortcolname` varchar(250) DEFAULT NULL, `dategroupbycriteria` varchar(250) DEFAULT NULL, KEY `fk_1_vtiger_vreportgroupbycolumn` (`reportid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

table.name: vtiger_vreportgroupbycolumn

table.sql: ALTER TABLE vtiger_vreportsummary ADD CONSTRAINT `fk_1_vtiger_vreportsummary` FOREIGN KEY (`reportsummaryid`) REFERENCES `vtiger_vreport` (`reportid`) ON DELETE CASCADE;

table.sql: ALTER TABLE `vtiger_vreporttype` ADD COLUMN `limit` int(11);

table.sql: ALTER TABLE `vtiger_vreporttype` ADD COLUMN `order_by` varchar(10);

table.name: vtiger_scheduled_vreports
table.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `vtiger_scheduled_vreports` ( `reportid` int(11) NOT NULL, `recipients` text, `schedule` text, `format` varchar(10) DEFAULT NULL, `next_trigger_time` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, PRIMARY KEY (`reportid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

table.name: vtiger_schedulevreports
table.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `vtiger_schedulevreports` ( `reportid` int(10) DEFAULT NULL, `scheduleid` int(3) DEFAULT NULL, `recipients` text, `schdate` varchar(20) DEFAULT NULL, `schtime` time DEFAULT NULL, `from_address` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `subject` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `body` text DEFAULT NULL, `schdayoftheweek` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `schdayofthemonth` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `schannualdates` varchar(500) DEFAULT NULL, `specificemails` text DEFAULT NULL, `next_trigger_time` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, `fileformat` varchar(10) DEFAULT 'CSV' ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

table.name: vtiger_schedulevreports
table.sql: ALTER TABLE `vtiger_schedulevreports` ADD COLUMN `signature` varchar(10) AFTER `body` ;

table.name: vtiger_schedulevreports
table.sql: ALTER TABLE `vtiger_schedulevreports` ADD COLUMN `signature_user` varchar(10) AFTER `signature` ;

table.name: vtiger_vreportsortcol
table.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `vtiger_vreportsortcol` ( `sortcolid` int(19) NOT NULL, `reportid` int(19) NOT NULL, `columnname` varchar(250) DEFAULT '', `sortorder` varchar(250) DEFAULT 'Asc', PRIMARY KEY (`sortcolid`,`reportid`), KEY `fk_1_vtiger_vreportsortcol` (`reportid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

table.name: vtiger_vreportsortcol
table.sql: ALTER TABLE vtiger_vreportsortcol ADD CONSTRAINT `fk_1_vtiger_vreportsortcol` FOREIGN KEY (`reportid`) REFERENCES `vtiger_vreport` (`reportid`) ON DELETE CASCADE;

table.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `vtiger_vreport_relcriteria_grouping` ( `groupid` int(11) NOT NULL, `queryid` int(19) NOT NULL, `groupparentid` int(11) NOT NULL, `group_condition` varchar(256) DEFAULT NULL, `condition_expression` text, PRIMARY KEY (`groupid`,`queryid`,`groupparentid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

table.name: vtiger_vreport_relcriteria
table.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `vtiger_vreport_relcriteria` ( `queryid` int(19) NOT NULL, `columnindex` int(11) NOT NULL, `columnname` varchar(250) DEFAULT '', `comparator` varchar(20) DEFAULT NULL, `value` varchar(512) DEFAULT NULL, `groupid` int(11) DEFAULT '1', `column_condition` varchar(256) DEFAULT 'and', `groupparentid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`queryid`,`columnindex`,`groupparentid`), KEY `vreport_relcriteria_queryid_idx` (`queryid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

table.name: vtiger_vreport_relcriteria
table.sql: ALTER TABLE vtiger_vreport_relcriteria ADD CONSTRAINT `fk_1_vtiger_vreport_relcriteria` FOREIGN KEY (`queryid`) REFERENCES `vtiger_selectquery` (`queryid`) ON DELETE CASCADE;

table.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS vtiger_vreportdashboard_tabs ( `id` int(19) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `tabname` varchar(50) DEFAULT NULL, `isdefault` int(1) DEFAULT 0, `sequence` int(5) DEFAULT 2, `appname` varchar(20) DEFAULT NULL, `modulename` varchar(50) DEFAULT NULL, `userid` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), UNIQUE `tabname` USING BTREE (`tabname`, `userid`) comment '', INDEX `vtiger_vreportdashboard_tabs_ibfk_1` USING BTREE (`userid`) comment '' ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

table.name: vtiger_vreportdashboard_tabs
table.sql: ALTER TABLE vtiger_vreportdashboard_tabs drop index `tabname`;

table.name: vtiger_vreportshistory
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_vreportshistory`( `id` INT(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT , `reportid` INT(11) , `reportname` VARCHAR(250) , `date_sent` DATETIME , `from_email` VARCHAR(250) , `to_email` TEXT , `cc_email` VARCHAR(250) , `bcc_email` VARCHAR(250) , `email_subject` VARCHAR(250) , `email_body` TEXT , `result` VARCHAR(10) , PRIMARY KEY(`id`) ) ENGINE = INNODB AUTO_INCREMENT = 1 DEFAULT CHARSET = utf8;
